title: T204 Keeler for sale: Best offer
author: memeri

posts.post_title: T204 Keeler for sale: Best offer
posts.post_content:
I know this is probably frowned upon - but I am wanting to sell my T204 Keeler and on a best offer basis.  See scan below.  I don't know what to ask on this card (I really don't) as I haven't seen another Keeler for sale in quite a while.  PM offers and I will consider.  If you don't like this practice I apologize and just ignore the thread.  Thanks in advance!

[IMG]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/7162/keeler.jpg[/IMG]

PS - Other T204's will be listed soon - and on a not "Best Offer" basis!

Matt

Msg sentu

No need for smart replies. A simple no will suffice db

Back scan will be posted when I get a chance - nothing to speak of looks like the front, all lettering clearly legible.  

@Ladder7 - Don't know what you ate for breakfast today but I can do without the "Douchebag" comments via this and PMs - I don't even know you, so please save that for someone you have actual beef with.  Yikes, you honestly scare me.

Yea, at tmes I do unto others... I gotta cut that out!
Please pardon the tirade and good luck selling.
Didn't mean anything by my comment that I didn't want to lose money - so apology accepted.  Good luck!
